ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby in Lower Guk
ygData.msgSnippet: ... *sniffles* Razzan sighs, clearly disappointed. People will always be biased. My main character is the wizard, and yes, I do agree that they are some
ygData.messageBody:
>
> From: Ryan Honeyman <honeyman@...>
>
> > but lately it seems like the people playing wizards are some of the
> > dumbest in the game.
>
> That is an understatement. The text when making your character:
>
> WIZARD.
>
> Welcome to Eurdin, city of knowledge...blah blah blah.
>
> This class/deity/race cominbation is of HIGH idiocy.
>

*sniffles*
Razzan sighs, clearly disappointed.
"People will always be biased."

My main character is the wizard, and yes, I do agree that they are some
really dumb wizards out there...but there are some really dumb
(insert any class here)'s out there also.

Wizards just have the biggest exclamation points on their mistakes.

Razzan
Erudite Wizard of E'ci
-- Smartest freak in the zone, and it shows (usually)
